001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
005import java.util.Properties;
006import org.springframework.core.io.ClassPathResource;
007import org.springframework.core.io.Resource;
008import org.springframework.core.io.support.PropertiesLoaderUtils;
009
010/**
011 * Utility class for loading and applying system-level properties from the classpath.
012 *
013 * <p>This class looks for a resource named <code>system.properties</code> on the classpath,
014 * and for each property defined therein, sets it into <code>System.getProperties()</code>
015 * if no value for that key is already present.</p>
016 *
017 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
018 */
019public final class PropertiesUtil {
020
021   private PropertiesUtil() {
022   }
023
024   /**
025    * Loads <code>system.properties</code> from the root of the classpath (if it exists)
026    * and applies each property to the JVM system properties, but only if that property
027    * has not already been defined.
028    *
029    * <p>If the resource cannot be read, this method wraps the resulting {@link IOException}
030    * in an unchecked {@link UncheckedIOException}.</p>
031    *
032    * @throws UncheckedIOException if reading or parsing <code>system.properties</code> fails
033    */
034   public static void addSystemProperties() {
035      Resource resource = getResource(); // your existing resolver
036      if (!resource.exists()) {
037         return;
038      }
039
040      try {
041         Properties props = PropertiesLoaderUtils.loadProperties(resource);
042         boolean surefire = isSurefireEnvironment();
043
044         for (String name : props.stringPropertyNames()) {
045            String value = props.getProperty(name);
046            if (surefire) {
047               if (System.getProperty(name) == null) {
048                  System.setProperty(name, value);
049               }
050            } else {
051               System.setProperty(name, value);
052            }
053         }
054      } catch (IOException e) {
055         throw new UncheckedIOException("Failed to load system.properties", e);
056      }
057   }
058
059   private static boolean isSurefireEnvironment() {
060      for (String key : System.getProperties().stringPropertyNames()) {
061         if (key.startsWith("surefire.")) {
062            return true;
063         }
064      }
065      return false;
066   }
067
068   static Resource getResource() {
069      return new ClassPathResource("system.properties");
070   }
071
072}
